name: Sukuti
description: Sukuti is a traditional Nepali delicacy made from dried and spiced meat, typically goat or buffalo. It is seasoned with Nepali spices, roasted, and served as a savory snack or in curries. A must-try for lovers of authentic Nepali cuisine.

name: Veg Momo
description: Steamed Nepali dumplings filled with a seasoned vegetable mixture, served with a tangy tomato-based dipping sauce.

name: Sel Roti
description: A traditional Nepali sweet, deep-fried rice flour bread, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, perfect for breakfast or snacks.

name: Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with a rich tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil on a thin, crispy crust.

name: Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and melted cheese, served on a toasted bun with a side of crispy fries.

name: Chowmein
description: Stir-fried noodles with mixed vegetables, soy sauce, and a hint of sesame, served with your choice of meat or tofu.

name: Samosa
description: Crispy deep-fried pastry filled with a spiced potato and pea mixture, served with a tangy tamarind chutney.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with spiced chicken, herbs, and saffron, served with raita and chutney.

name: Beer
description: A refreshing chilled beer, perfect to pair with a variety of meals. Light, crisp, and brewed to perfection, it's a great choice to unwind and enjoy the moment.
